answers.author: Pooja Varma
answers.text:
Hello, 
If you're asking about a retirement account, you may be looking for ICMA-RC. (ICMA and ICMA-RC are separate organizations.) You can visit their website at www.icma-rc.org, or call 1-800-669-7400.
Pooja 
International City/County Management Association
Knowledge Network Intern
pvarma@icma.org

answers.author: Nguyen Dong
answers.text:
Hello! My name is Nguyen Thanh Dong, the work unit in "investment fund development of Lao Cai province Lao Cai City, Lao Cai province - Vietnam. The most difficult joining ICMA network of intellectuals is to be derived from Where as my knowledge in intellectual networking primitive ... just to say my work is indeed quite difficult because the position of economic management do not have much experience, my fields of work are new . In order to participate and discuss with you in all areas look forward to your suggestions, thank you!

author: Susan Lynch
text: I have a loan on my account and I would like to know what the balance is.
title: Request for Loan Balance
